flawed_nl_solution:
So the total number of streetlights that will be used is 15 squares * 12 streetlights/square = <<15*12=180>>180 streetlights
There will be 200 streetlights - 180 streetlights = <<200-180=30>>30 streetlights unused.
#### 30

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 30. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
